about_the_game:
Warning: This game is not a typical horror game. It features extensive narrative details and relatively difficult and creative puzzles that are not easily solved. Additionally, 90% of the story is told through environmental storytelling. Therefore, solving the puzzles and understanding the story require thinking and paying close attention to details.

First-Person Philosophical Horror – Explore, solve puzzles, escape enemies, and uncover five interconnected endings.

Step into the eerie world of Satan's Dungeon, a first-person horror game that blends psychological terror with intricate puzzles and a non-linear narrative. You begin your journey exploring an abandoned tunnel in search of a legendary treasure, only to stumble upon a mysterious mirror. The moment you touch it, you are transported into a sinister dungeon—trapped, with no clear way out.

Throughout the game, a cryptic voice guides you, urging you to solve complex puzzles and evade terrifying enemies. The gameplay is dynamic and ever-changing, with mirrors allowing you to witness the memories of those who were trapped before you. These glimpses into the past not only provide valuable items but also unravel the dungeon’s dark and twisted history.

But here’s what makes Satan’s Dungeon truly unique: The story unfolds non-linearly, and each ending is a piece of a larger puzzle. Every ending builds upon the previous one, revealing new layers of meaning and altering the game world itself. To fully understand the complete story and grasp the true significance of each conclusion, you must experience all five endings.

Features:

  • A unique psychological horror experience with an unsettling atmosphere.

  • Challenging and complex puzzles that test your logic and perception.

  • A non-linear storytelling approach, where choices and actions reshape the experience.

  • Mirrors that connect you to the memories of past prisoners, revealing vital secrets.

  • Five interconnected endings, each expanding the narrative and changing the world around you.

Are you ready to enter Satan's Dungeon and uncover the truth hidden within?

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes memories of individuals who were present in this location in the past, each of whom has committed crimes. Players may encounter corpses or crime scenes, but there is no direct depiction of murder or sexual content.

name: Satan's Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 7400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Latest drivers for AMD and NVIDIA
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 8GB
  • Storage: 7400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Latest drivers for AMD and NVIDIA

short_description: First-person Philosophical Horror. Explore, solve puzzles, escape enemies, and uncover 5 unique endings.
